About me

Hello. My name is Ishank Agrawal. I am an American currently living in India for the last 4 years. My main interests are maths, physics, sketching potraits, running and playing basketball with my friends. You can learn more about me here. Below you can view my awards and view my sketches in my website. Thank you for visiting!
